text: NGC 755 is an emission line spiral galaxy in the constellation of Cetus. The galaxy's velocity of 1641.2 km/s was used to calculate its distance using the Tully–Fisher relation. Its dark matter halo was found to be core-dominated, in agreement with predictions from the lambda-CDM model of cosmology. == References == == External links == * * ned.ipac.caltech.edu 0755 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Barred spiral galaxies
title: NGC 755
